reviewText: As always, Michael Jackson is the best. Would advise any Michael Jackson fan to buy this. My rating for this is A++++.
As with any of Michael Jackson's top selling albums of all time, this is no exception BUT - I paid way to much money for this now that I see it elsewhere for much, much less.

This same item can be bought anywhere on Amazon for far cheaper than what is being sold here. Just look around and you'll see.

Jacking up the price to over $100 after the guy dies is pathetic. I hope NO ONE buys your item, sucka!!

By the way, why did it take the man's death to make a God out of him? Before that he was a child molester, Wacko-Jacko, and now he's MJ! People are stupid!!
Great combo.  We purchased it at Hastings in Las Cruces for $9.99 last wk (Feb 12 2009), pristine condition, like new but used.  Thinking about selling it on ebay for $114.99!!!
